TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlobalCatalog extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController

Docs.summary: The GlobalCatalog class represents a global catalog server. A global catalog server is a domain controller that hosts a replica of the global catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController DisableGlobalCatalog ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController DisableGlobalCatalog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Demotes this domain controller from a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController"> object that represents the domain controller.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog EnableGlobalCatalog ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog EnableGlobalCatalog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Not supported for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> class because this domain controller is already a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: Not applicable. This method will always throw an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException"> exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);
.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAll(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of the context must be a forest.
Docs.summary: Finds all global catalog servers in the specified context.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection"> object that contains the global catalog servers found by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAll(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteName) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of the context must be a forest.
The name of the site to search for global catalog servers.
Docs.summary: Finds all global catalog servers in the specified context and site.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection"> object that contains the global catalog servers found by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection FindAllProperties ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection FindAllProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties that are stored on this global catalog server.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains the Active Directory Domain Services properties that are stored on this global catalog server.

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
Docs.summary: Finds a single global catalog server in the specified context.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> object that represents the global catalog server found by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions flag);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog FindOne(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions flag) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
A combination of one or more of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions"> members that defines the type of global catalog server to find.
Docs.summary: Finds a single global catalog server in the specified context, allowing for additional search options.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog"> object that represents the global catalog server found by the search.

Docs.summary: Determines if this domain controller is a global catalog server.
Docs.returns: `true` if this domain controller is a global catalog server; `false` if it is not a global catalog server.
